short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Initiate searches in Google Incognito mode directly from the context menu for any selected text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search in Incognito offers a swift and private way to search the web directly from any webpage you’re browsing. By enabling you to instantly search for highlighted text in Google using Incognito mode, it ensures your searches remain confidential and your browsing experience seamless.

Key Features:
- Enhanced Privacy: Initiate searches in Google Incognito mode directly from the context menu for any selected text, keeping your search activities private.

- Simple and Intuitive: Avoid the hassle of manual steps to search in privacy. With just a right-click, transform your browsing experience into one that prioritizes convenience and efficiency.

- Efficient Access: Utilize the custom context menu item “Search Google for ‘%s'” to start your private searches without interrupting your browsing flow.

- Minimalist and Fast: Designed to operate discreetly in the background, our extension is lightweight, ensuring that your browser’s performance remains optimal.

How to Use Search in Incognito:
- Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
- Highlight text on any webpage that you wish to search.
- Right-click the selected text and choose “Search Google for ‘%s'” from the context menu.
- An Incognito window will instantly open with your Google search results, maintaining your privacy.

Why Search in Incognito?

Privacy is a necessity in the digital era. Whether you’re conducting sensitive research, planning a surprise, or simply prefer keeping your searches to yourself, Search in Incognito is your go-to tool for maintaining online privacy. It offers an effortless way to ensure your search queries don’t influence future search suggestions or saved history.
